SEO.title: Industry Info, News & Tips
SEO.description: Check our blog for the latest updates and news from the world of blockchain, AI, VR, IoT, software and app development.

data.title: How Can Blockchain Upend Crowdfunding?
data.baseline: Crowdfunding platforms have helped foster numerous good causes and promote innovation. Blockchain, for its part, has the potential to make crowdfunding more sophisticated and secure, while also introducing a whole bunch of cutting-edge opportunities.

data.title: Best NFT Marketplaces You Need to Know About
data.baseline: NFTs have burst into our lives at full pelt, giving creators a new opportunity to fairly monetize their artworks and turning a huge number of people into big admirers of whimsical kitties and arrogant apes. But what marketplace should you choose for buying and selling NFTs efficiently and securely?

data.title: How Are NFTs Regulated: Legal Issues, Taxation Aspects and More
data.baseline: The hype around NFTs shows no sign of stopping anytime soon.  We’re pretty sure that non-fungible tokens are here to stay. At the same time, though, the growing demand for NFTs is leading to legal and regulatory concerns.

data.title: How the Metaverse Revamps the eCommerce Sector
data.baseline: The metaverse has opened a door to innovation in industries such as gaming and digital real estate. Now the technology looks set to upend the eCommerce domain too — but the question is how?

data.title: How Do NFTs Transform the Art Industry?
data.baseline: If you’ve been reading the headlines about crazy sales of NFT art, you probably have a list of questions floating around your head. Is it all just hype, or should you go ahead and invest in this field? How can you actually capitalize on NFT art? And, most importantly, what does its future look like?

data.title: What Is the Difference Between Blockchain Consensus Algorithms?
data.baseline: The consensus mechanism is a component without which a blockchain cannot exist. It powers blockchain ecosystems and keeps them secure. But what other purposes do consensus algorithms serve, and which one is best?

preview320.title: blockchain-in-real-estate-main-1600
preview320.alt: Blockchain in the real estate industry

data.title: How Does Blockchain Benefit the Real Estate Industry?
data.baseline: It seems that no industry can afford to ignore blockchain. Offering some notable advantages, blockchain is now conquering the real estate world, making its complicated processes more transparent and intelligible.

data.title: How Can Your Fashion Brand Benefit From the Introduction of NFTs?
data.baseline: The wave of NFT hype doesn’t look like it’s going to stop any time soon, as more and more people join the craze. Now we also see big fashion names grabbing the opportunity to raise brand awareness with NFT collections.
